Structs/TilemapParseData.html#/s:17The_C.name: definition
Structs/TilemapParseData.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The tile definition for this given tile.

Structs/TilemapParseData.html#/s:17The_C.name: sprite
Structs/TilemapParseData.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The associated sprite node for this tile.

Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.name: outputLocation
Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.abstract: The location in the map that corresponds to the output.

Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.name: requiredInputs
Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.abstract: A list of locations that correspond to the inputs.

Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.name: requisite
Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.abstract: The requisite for the output to be activated.

Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.name: getRequisite(from:)
Structs/SwitchRequisite.html#/s:17The_Co.abstract: Get the requisite for a given output based on a configuration string.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: shared
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: A shared copy of the game store.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: lastSavedScene
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The last scene that was loaded before the game ended.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: costumeIncrementUSB
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The number of times the player switched into the flash drive costume.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: costumeIncrementBird
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The number of times the player switched into the bird costume.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: costumeIncrementSorceress
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The number of times the player switched into the sorceress costume.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: clear()
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: Reset the game store to their default values.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: costumeID
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The ID that determines what costumes are avaiable, with 0 indicating no costumes annd 3 indicating all costumes.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: linksToNextScene
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The name of the SKScene that will load after the current scene this level configuration is attached to.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: startWithCostume
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The costume the player will start with by default.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: exitLocation
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The matrix location of the exit door.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: defaultTimerDelay
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The default amount of time on alarm clock timers.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: requisites
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: A list of the requisites for switches and receivers.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: achievementTrigger
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The achievement to earn when passing through the achievement trigger, if one exists.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: default
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: A default level configuration with no costumes loaded and the next scene set to the main menu.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: parseRequisites(from:)
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: Parse a given dictionary into a list of requisites.

Structs/CommandLineArguments.html#/s:17T.name: startLevel
Structs/CommandLineArguments.html#/s:17T.abstract: The name of the file to open on startup. Defaults to nil (no file).

Structs/CommandLineArguments.html.name: CommandLineArguments
Structs/CommandLineArguments.html.abstract: A data structure that contains the command line arguments for the execution context.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html.name: LevelDataConfiguration
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html.abstract: A data structure used to determine the properties of a level based on a user data dictionary.

Structs/GameStore.html.name: GameStore
Structs/GameStore.html.abstract: A structure that represents the game’s store data.

Structs/SwitchRequisite.html.name: SwitchRequisite
Structs/SwitchRequisite.html.abstract: A data structure that represents a configuration for a switch requisite.

Structs/TilemapParseData.html.name: TilemapParseData
Structs/TilemapParseData.html.abstract: A data structure that contains the data for a parsed tilemap.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: defaultOn
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: Whether the device is on by default.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: activationMethod
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: The means of how this receiver will react to input signals.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: inputs
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: The inputs that connect to this receiver.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: baseTextureName
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: The base texture name for this receiver.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: activeTexture
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: The texture for this receiver, accounting for the signal state.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: levelPosition
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: The position of the output in context with the level world.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: update()
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: Update the properties of the receiver’s sprite.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: updateInputs()
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: Update the status of this receiver based on new inputs.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html.name: GameSignalReceivable
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html.abstract: A base protocol that defines an object that receives signals from inputs.

Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster11g.name: getTileType(fromDefinition:)
Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster11g.abstract: Get the type of tile from a given definition.

Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster18g.name: getWallPhysicsBody(with:)
Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster18g.abstract: Create a physics body for a wall with a given texture.

Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster18g.name: getWallPhysicsBody(with:)
Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster18g.abstract: Create a physics body for a wall with a given texture.

Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster5pl.name: plist(from:)
Functions.html#/s:17The_Costumemaster5pl.abstract: Read a property list file and get the contents as a dictionary.

Extensions/SKTileMapNode.html#/s:So13SKT.name: parse(handler:)
Extensions/SKTileMapNode.html#/s:So13SKT.abstract: Iterate through the tilemap and apply a function to each tile.

Extensions/KeyboardShortcuts.html#/s:17K.name: movementKeys
Extensions/KeyboardShortcuts.html#/s:17K.abstract: The shortcut properties for the movement keys.

Extensions/KeyboardShortcuts.html#/s:17K.name: auxiliaryKeys
Extensions/KeyboardShortcuts.html#/s:17K.abstract: The shortcut properties for auxiliary keys such as using and costume changing.

Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:So7CGPointV17.name: distance(between:)
Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:So7CGPointV17.abstract: Find the distance between this point and another point.

Extensions/CommandLine.html#/s:s11Comman.name: parse()
Extensions/CommandLine.html#/s:s11Comman.abstract: Parse the command line arguments to get the settings for this execution context.

Extensions/CommandLine.html#/s:s11Comman.name: getArgument(of:)
Extensions/CommandLine.html#/s:s11Comman.abstract: Get the resulting value of a passed argument.

Extensions/GKAchievement.html#/s:So13GKA.name: earn(with:)
Extensions/GKAchievement.html#/s:So13GKA.abstract: Earn an achievment with a given identifier.

Extensions/GKAchievement.html#/s:So13GKA.name: earn(with:)
Extensions/GKAchievement.html#/s:So13GKA.abstract: Earn an achievement with a given achievement.

Extensions/GKAchievement.html#/s:So13GKA.name: updateProgress(on:to:)
Extensions/GKAchievement.html#/s:So13GKA.abstract: Update the progress on earning an achievmeent.

Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: faceReveal
Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: Face Reveal: Skipped the game and convinced her to do a face reveal.

Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: newBird
Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: Learning to Fly: Became a bird for the first time.

Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: newSorceress
Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: Thinking with Magic: Became a sorceress for the first time.

Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: endReveal
Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: Underneath it All: Found out who you are.

Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: quickfooted
Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: Quickfooted: Switch to the bird costume at least 100 times.

Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: superliminal
Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: It’s About Perspective: Break out of bounds and find the secret.

Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: overclocker
Enums/GameAchievement.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: Overclocker: Complete the level “Divergent” in 100 seconds or less.

Enums/GameAchievement.html.name: GameAchievement
Enums/GameAchievement.html.abstract: A enumeration that represents the different achievements players can earn in the game.

Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html.name: GameSignalInputMethod
Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html.abstract: An enumeration that defines the different types of inputs that are used in the game.

Enums/GameSignalKind.html.name: GameSignalKind
Enums/GameSignalKind.html.abstract: An enumeration that represent the different kinds of inputs.

Enums/GameSignalMethod.html.name: GameSignalMethod
Enums/GameSignalMethod.html.abstract: An enumeration that represents the different requirements for an output to activate.

Enums/PlayerMoveDirection.html.name: PlayerMoveDirection
Enums/PlayerMoveDirection.html.abstract: An enumeration for the different directions a player can move.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: startButton
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: The label node for the “Start Game” button.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: resumeButton
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: The label node for the “Resume Game” button.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: quitButton
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: The label node for the “Quit Game” button.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: gameCenterButton
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: The Game Center sprite node for the Game Center dashboard.

Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: unit
Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The base unit size for a given tile in a level.

Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: structure
Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: A child node that stores the structure of the level.

Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: checkWallStates(with:)
Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: Check the wall states and update their physics bodies.

Classes/DivergentChallenge.html#/s:17The.name: eligible
Classes/DivergentChallenge.html#/s:17The.abstract: Whether the player is eligible for receiving the achievement.

Classes/DivergentChallenge.html#/c:@M@Th.name: keyDown(with:)
Classes/DivergentChallenge.html#/c:@M@Th.abstract: Listen to the keys and disable the eligibility factor if a keypress for the costume change is active.

Classes/DivergentChallenge.html#/s:17The.name: willCalcuateChallengeResults()
Classes/DivergentChallenge.html#/s:17The.abstract: Determine if the time to complete the level is less than 100 seconds and grant an achievement.

Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html#/c:@M@Th.name: update(_:)
Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html#/c:@M@Th.abstract: Run the standard level game loop and update the challenge states as necessary.

Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html#/c:@M@Th.name: willMove(from:)
Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html#/c:@M@Th.abstract: Move to the next view and calculate the final challenge scores.

Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html#/s:17The.name: willCalcuateChallengeResults()
Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html#/s:17The.abstract: Run any challenge calculations after a given event.

Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.name: costume
Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.abstract: Thre current costume the player is wearing.

Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.name: getCostumeSet(id:)
Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.abstract: Get the list of costumes from a given ID.

Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.name: move(_:)
Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.abstract: Move the player by a specific amount.

Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.name: halt()
Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.abstract: Stop the player from moving and remove all current animations.

Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.name: move(_:unit:)
Classes/Player.html#/s:17The_Costumemast.abstract: Move the player in a given direction, relative to the size of the world.

Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/s:17The_.name: shouldActivateOnIntervention(with:objects:)
Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/s:17The_.abstract: Whether the input should turn on/off based on player or object intervention.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: active
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: Whether the input is currently active. Defaults to false.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: activationMethod
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The method that this input will activate. Default is by player intervention.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: kind
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The kind of sender. Defaults to a trigger.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: baseTexture
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The name of the base texture for this input.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: cooldown
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The number of seconds it takes for the input to toggle.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: levelPosition
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The position of this input in context with the level.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: activeTexture
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The texture for this input, accounting for active states.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: activate(with:player:objects:)
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: Activate the input given an event and player.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: shouldActivateOnIntervention(with:objects:)
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: Whether the input should turn on/off based on player or object intervention.

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.name: gameAchievement
Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.abstract: The achievement to earn when passing through the trigger.

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.name: shouldActivateOnIntervention(with:objects:)
Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.abstract: Whether the input should turn on/off based on player or object intervention.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: defaultOn
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: Whether the door is on by default.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: activationMethod
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: The method of how this door will be activated.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: inputs
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: The list of inputs that activate the door.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: baseTextureName
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: The base texture name for the door.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: levelPosition
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: The position of this door in the world matrix.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: receive(with:event:handler:)
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: Receive input from a player or event.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: updateInputs()
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: Update the list of inputs and their receivers.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.name: togglePhysicsBody()
Classes/DoorReceiver.html#/s:17The_Costu.abstract: Toggle the physics body for the door.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html.name: DoorReceiver
Classes/DoorReceiver.html.abstract: A class that represents a door. This is commonly used for exit doors, but can be adapted to use any door.

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html.name: GameAchievementTrigger
Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html.abstract: A class representation of a Game Center achievement trigger.

Classes/GameAlarmClock.html.name: GameAlarmClock
Classes/GameAlarmClock.html.abstract: A class representation of an alarm clock (timer).

Classes/GameSignalSender.html.name: GameSignalSender
Classes/GameSignalSender.html.abstract: A base class that determines an input.

Classes/GamePressurePlate.html.name: GamePressurePlate
Classes/GamePressurePlate.html.abstract: An input that uses pressure sensitivity to activate.

Classes/Player.html.name: Player
Classes/Player.html.abstract: A class representation of the game player.

Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html.name: ChallengeGameScene
Classes/ChallengeGameScene.html.abstract: An extended class of the game level scene dedicated to challenges.

Classes/DivergentChallenge.html.name: DivergentChallenge
Classes/DivergentChallenge.html.abstract: The game scene specific to the level “Divergent”.

Classes/GameScene.html.name: GameScene
Classes/GameScene.html.abstract: The base class for a given level.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html.name: MainMenuScene
Classes/MainMenuScene.html.abstract: The scene class for the main menu.
